text: @GOPLeader @ThinkBig1111 @realDonaldTrump Yrp, by the time y'all get done with your superb "leadership" in mobilizing our national resources in support Trump's "Chlorine Consumption Strategy" to deal with #COVID19  National Emergency, we'll need all "Houses of worship" to mourn our dead.  Mercifully, Election, soon!
